security_audit.summary: All 50 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. This is a pure documentation skill containing only troubleshooting guidance patterns. No executable code exists. The 'commands' flagged are markdown documentation examples, not actual shell execution. Hash fields using SHA-256 were incorrectly flagged as 'weak cryptographic algorithms'. YAML frontmatter entropy triggered false 'obfuscation' alerts. Legitimate skill with no malicious intent.

content.value_statement: Technical errors slow down development progress. This skill automatically diagnoses issues, identifies root causes, and guides resolution steps so developers can return to building quickly.
actual_capabilities: Auto-detect problems from user descriptions like not working or error
Run diagnostic commands to check environment, dependencies, and build status
Identify issue categories including dependency, type, build, runtime, and config errors
Guide users through LSP diagnostics for precise error location
Suggest appropriate fixes with user confirmation for destructive operations
Generate escalation reports for complex issues
limitations: Cannot fix issues that require manual server or infrastructure access
Cannot recover data from crashed systems without existing backups
Limited to JavaScript and TypeScript project troubleshooting patterns

use_cases.title: Learn debugging skills
use_cases.description: New developers learn systematic troubleshooting steps instead of guessing solutions

use_cases.title: Fast error resolution
use_cases.description: Get quick diagnosis and targeted fixes for common build and runtime issues

use_cases.title: AI-assisted problem solving
use_cases.description: Resolve issues through guided diagnosis without deep technical knowledge

prompt_templates.title: Quick diagnosis
prompt_templates.prompt: Detect problems like Âãï„Åã„Å™„ÅÑ, „Ç®„É©„Éº„ÅåÂá∫„Åü, Â£ä„Çå„Åü and start diagnosis

prompt_templates.title: Build issues
prompt_templates.prompt: npm run build failed. Check error logs, identify root cause, and suggest solution

prompt_templates.title: Dependency problems
prompt_templates.prompt: Cannot find module error. Check dependencies and run npm install if needed

prompt_templates.title: Runtime crashes
prompt_templates.prompt: Screen is blank. Check JavaScript errors, build issues, and routing problems

output_examples.input: npm run build is failing with errors
output: Error detected: Type error in src/components/Form.tsx line 45
Cause: Cannot assign type string to type number
Solution: Convert value to number or update type definition

output_examples.input: The application shows a blank white screen
output: Checking build logs... No errors found
Likely causes: JavaScript runtime error or routing issue
Run detailed diagnostics for full analysis?

best_practices: Provide specific error messages and recent code changes when describing problems
Confirm before running destructive commands like rm or git reset --hard
Use dev-browser tool for visual or UI-related issues when available
anti_patterns: Running fix commands without first understanding the root cause
Ignoring repeated failures and continuing without escalating to human review
Skipping the diagnostic step and jumping straight to code changes

faq.question: What types of errors can this skill handle?
faq.answer: Handles dependency errors, type errors, build failures, runtime crashes, and configuration issues in JS and TS projects.

faq.question: Does this skill modify my code automatically?
faq.answer: It suggests fixes but always asks for confirmation before making changes, especially for destructive operations.

faq.question: Can it troubleshoot issues outside this project?
faq.answer: Limited to the current project. System-level or infrastructure issues require manual intervention.

faq.question: Is my code or data sent anywhere?
faq.answer: No. This skill runs locally using Read, Grep, and Bash tools only. No network calls to external servers.

faq.question: What if automated fixes do not work?
faq.answer: After 3 failed attempts, the skill escalates to human review with a detailed problem summary.

faq.question: How is this different from error recovery agents?
faq.answer: This skill provides structured diagnosis first, then applies targeted fixes. Error recovery agents typically jump straight to fixes.
